useCase.name: Reserve Football Pitch

preconditions.precondition: The Customer selects a football pitch.

successEndConditions.condition: The football pitch reservation is successfully completed.

useCase.trigger: Customer selects a football pitch and time slot.

mainSequence.step: System confirms the selected time slot.
System checks the availability of the selected time slot.
FootballPitchClass checks the time slot availability.
System allows the reservation of the time slot.
System notifies the Customer of successful reservation.
